actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that pay adjustments for Member of Congress take effect in the Congress next following the Congress in which they are approved.

summary.text: Provides that pay adjustments for Members of Congress shall take effect in the Congress next following the Congress in which they are approved.

titles.title: A bill to provide that pay adjustments for Member of Congress take effect in the Congress next following the Congress in which they are approved.
